messages.content: You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "BAW123", "dep_runway": "RW27L", "destination": "EGLL", "sid": "CPT3F", "squawk": "4521", "initial_altitude_ft": 6000}
PILOT: Delivery, Speedbird one two three, request IFR clearance
Speedbird one two three, cleared to Heathrow via Charlie Papa Tango three Foxtrot departure, runway two seven left, climb initially six thousand feet, squawk four five two one.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "EZY456", "dep_runway": "RW09R", "destination": "LFPG", "sid": "DET2F", "squawk": "7234", "initial_altitude_ft": 5000}
PILOT: Easy four five six, clearance request
Easy four five six, cleared to Paris Charles de Gaulle via Delta Echo Tango two Foxtrot departure, runway zero niner right, climb initially five thousand feet, squawk seven two three four.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "RYR789", "dep_runway": "RW24", "destination": "LEMD", "sid": "GOSAM1C", "squawk": "5612", "initial_altitude_ft": 6000}
PILOT: Ryanair seven eight niner, request IFR to Madrid
Ryanair seven eight niner, cleared to Madrid via Golf Oscar Sierra Alpha Mike one Charlie departure, runway two four, climb initially six thousand feet, squawk five six one two.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "DLH901", "dep_runway": "RW08L", "destination": "EDDF", "sid": "LAM3F", "squawk": "3456", "initial_altitude_ft": 5000, "cruise_level": "FL350"}
PILOT: Lufthansa niner zero one, request clearance to Frankfurt, flight level three five zero

Lufthansa niner zero one, cleared to Frankfurt flight level three five zero via Lima Alpha Mike three Foxtrot departure, runway zero eight left, climb initially five thousand feet, squawk three four five six.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "UAE555", "dep_runway": "RW30R", "destination": "OMDB", "sid": "BUZAD2G", "squawk": "6789", "initial_altitude_ft": 6000, "cruise_level": "FL410"}
PILOT: Emirates five five five, IFR clearance to Dubai, flight level four one zero

Emirates five five five, cleared to Dubai flight level four one zero via Bravo Uniform Zulu Alpha Delta two Golf departure, runway three zero right, climb initially six thousand feet, squawk six seven eight niner.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "GROUND", "callsign": "BAW123", "dep_runway": "RW27L", "taxi_route": "A B1"}
PILOT: Speedbird one two three, request taxi
Speedbird one two three, taxi to holding point runway two seven left via Alpha, Bravo one.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "GROUND", "callsign": "EZY456", "dep_runway": "RW09R", "taxi_route": "N1 N A"}
PILOT: Easy four five six, ready to taxi
Easy four five six, taxi to holding point runway zero niner right via November one, November, Alpha.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "GROUND", "callsign": "AFR678", "dep_runway": "RW26L"}
PILOT: Air France six seven eight, holding short runway two six left
Air France six seven eight, contact Tower one one eight decimal nine.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "GROUND", "callsign": "SWR234", "cross_runway": "RW09"}
PILOT: Swiss two three four, request cross runway zero niner
Swiss two three four, cross runway zero niner, report vacated.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "BAW123", "dep_runway": "RW27L"}
PILOT: Speedbird one two three, holding point runway two seven left, ready for departure
Speedbird one two three, line up and wait runway two seven left.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "EZY456", "dep_runway": "RW09R", "wind_dir": 080, "wind_kt": 12}
PILOT: Easy four five six, ready for departure
Easy four five six, wind zero eight zero degrees one two knots, runway zero niner right, cleared for takeoff.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "RYR789", "dep_runway": "RW24", "wind_dir": 250, "wind_kt": 8}
PILOT: Ryanair seven eight niner, lined up runway two four
Ryanair seven eight niner, wind two five zero degrees eight knots, runway two four, cleared for takeoff.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "DLH901", "dep_runway": "RW08L"}
PILOT: Lufthansa niner zero one, airborne
Lufthansa niner zero one, contact Departure one two one decimal zero five, good day.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DEPARTURE", "callsign": "BAW123", "cleared_altitude_ft": 15000}
PILOT: Speedbird one two three, passing three thousand climbing six thousand
Speedbird one two three, radar contact, climb flight level one five zero.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DEPARTURE", "callsign": "EZY456", "cleared_altitude_ft": 24000, "cleared_heading_deg": 270}
PILOT: Easy four five six, with you passing eight thousand
Easy four five six, radar contact, turn left heading two seven zero, climb flight level two four zero.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "CENTER", "callsign": "UAE555", "cruise_level": "FL410"}
PILOT: Emirates five five five, level flight level four one zero
Emirates five five five, radar contact, maintain flight level four one zero.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "CENTER", "callsign": "QTR999", "cleared_altitude_ft": 35000}
PILOT: Qatar niner niner niner, request climb flight level three niner zero
Qatar niner niner niner, climb flight level three niner zero.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "CENTER", "callsign": "SAS147", "cleared_heading_deg": 180}
PILOT: Scandinavian one four seven, request direct KONAN
Scandinavian one four seven, proceed direct KONAN.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "APPROACH", "callsign": "BAW123", "arr_runway": "RW27R", "cleared_altitude_ft": 4000}
PILOT: Speedbird one two three, with you descending flight level one two zero
Speedbird one two three, radar contact, descend four thousand feet, expect ILS runway two seven right.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "APPROACH", "callsign": "EZY456", "arr_runway": "RW09L", "cleared_heading_deg": 050}
PILOT: Easy four five six, request vectors ILS
Easy four five six, turn right heading zero five zero, vectors ILS runway zero niner left.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "APPROACH", "callsign": "DLH901", "arr_runway": "RW25L"}
PILOT: Lufthansa niner zero one, established ILS two five left
Lufthansa niner zero one, roger, contact Tower one one eight decimal five.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "BAW123", "arr_runway": "RW27R", "wind_dir": 280, "wind_kt": 15}
PILOT: Speedbird one two three, finals runway two seven right
Speedbird one two three, wind two eight zero degrees one five knots, runway two seven right, cleared to land.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "EZY456", "arr_runway": "RW09L", "wind_dir": 100, "wind_kt": 8}
PILOT: Easy four five six, short final zero niner left
Easy four five six, wind one zero zero degrees eight knots, runway zero niner left, cleared to land.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "AFR678", "arr_runway": "RW26L"}
PILOT: Air France six seven eight, runway vacated
Air France six seven eight, contact Ground one two one decimal seven five.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "RYR789"}
PILOT: Ryanair seven eight niner, going around
Ryanair seven eight niner, roger, climb three thousand feet, turn left heading one eight zero, contact Approach one two zero decimal four.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "GROUND", "callsign": "DLH901", "taxi_route": "L M", "stand": "42"}
PILOT: Lufthansa niner zero one, request taxi to stand
Lufthansa niner zero one, taxi to stand four two via Lima, Mike.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "THY321", "dep_runway": "RW06", "destination": "LTBA", "sid": "WOTAN1D", "squawk": "2345", "initial_altitude_ft": 4000}
PILOT: Turkish three two one, request clearance Istanbul
Turkish three two one, cleared to Istanbul via Whiskey Oscar Tango Alpha November one Delta departure, runway zero six, climb initially four thousand feet, squawk two three four five.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "KLM452", "dep_runway": "RW18C", "destination": "EHAM", "sid": "LOGAN2S", "squawk": "4567", "initial_altitude_ft": 5000}
PILOT: KLM four five two, clearance to Amsterdam
KLM four five two, cleared to Amsterdam via Lima Oscar Golf Alpha November two Sierra departure, runway one eight center, climb initially five thousand feet, squawk four five six seven.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "AAL100", "dep_runway": "RW04R", "destination": "KJFK", "sid": "BRECON1A", "squawk": "7777", "initial_altitude_ft": 6000, "cruise_level": "FL370"}
PILOT: American one zero zero, IFR to New York JFK

American one zero zero, cleared to New York JFK flight level three seven zero via Bravo Romeo Echo Charlie Oscar November one Alpha departure, runway zero four right, climb initially six thousand feet, squawk seven seven seven seven.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "SWR234"}
PILOT: Swiss two three four, radio check
Swiss two three four, reading you five.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "GROUND", "callsign": "BAW123"}
PILOT: Speedbird one two three, request pushback
Speedbird one two three, pushback approved, face south.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "GROUND", "callsign": "EZY456"}
PILOT: Easy four five six, request startup
Easy four five six, startup approved.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "DLH901", "dep_runway": "RW08L"}
PILOT: Lufthansa niner zero one, holding short zero eight left, traffic on final
Lufthansa niner zero one, hold position, traffic on short final.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "AFR678"}
PILOT: Air France six seven eight, cancel takeoff
Air France six seven eight, hold position, cancel takeoff, I say again cancel takeoff, acknowledge.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "APPROACH", "callsign": "UAE555", "arr_runway": "RW30L"}
PILOT: Emirates five five five, request hold
Emirates five five five, enter holding pattern as published, expect approach time two five.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "APPROACH", "callsign": "QTR999", "speed_restriction_kt": 180}
PILOT: Qatar niner niner niner, request speed reduction
Qatar niner niner niner, reduce speed one eight zero knots.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "CENTER", "callsign": "SAS147"}
PILOT: Scandinavian one four seven, mayday mayday mayday, engine failure
Scandinavian one four seven, roger mayday, squawk seven seven zero zero, say souls on board and fuel remaining.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "BAW123", "arr_runway": "RW27R"}
PILOT: Speedbird one two three, continue approach?
Speedbird one two three, continue approach, runway two seven right.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DEPARTURE", "callsign": "EZY456", "next_freq": "132.6"}
PILOT: Easy four five six, level flight level two four zero
Easy four five six, contact London Control one three two decimal six, good day.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "GROUND", "callsign": "DLH901"}
PILOT: Lufthansa niner zero one, say again taxi instructions
Lufthansa niner zero one, taxi via Alpha, hold short runway two seven left.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "VIR234", "dep_runway": "RW09", "destination": "KJFK", "squawk": "4321", "initial_altitude_ft": 6000, "via_radar_vectors": true}
PILOT: Virgin two three four, request clearance to JFK
Virgin two three four, cleared to New York JFK via radar vectors, runway zero niner, climb initially six thousand feet, squawk four three two one.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "RYR789", "dep_runway": "RW24", "intersection": "A3"}
PILOT: Ryanair seven eight niner, request intersection departure Alpha three
Ryanair seven eight niner, intersection Alpha three approved, line up and wait runway two four.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "APPROACH", "callsign": "THY321", "arr_runway": "RW35L", "cleared_altitude_ft": 3000}
PILOT: Turkish three two one, intercept localizer
Turkish three two one, cleared ILS approach runway three five left.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "CENTER", "callsign": "KLM452", "qnh_hpa": 1013}
PILOT: KLM four five two, request descent
KLM four five two, descend flight level one two zero, QNH one zero one three.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "FIN567", "dep_runway": "RW22", "destination": "EFHK", "sid": "MAVOS1P", "squawk": "5678", "initial_altitude_ft": 5000}
PILOT: Finnair five six seven, clearance Helsinki
Finnair five six seven, cleared to Helsinki via Mike Alpha Victor Oscar Sierra one Papa departure, runway two two, climb initially five thousand feet, squawk five six seven eight.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "DELIVERY", "callsign": "SAS890", "dep_runway": "RW12", "destination": "ESSA", "sid": "NAVAL2B", "squawk": "6543", "initial_altitude_ft": 4000}
PILOT: Scandinavian eight niner zero, IFR Stockholm
Scandinavian eight niner zero, cleared to Stockholm via November Alpha Victor Alpha Lima two Bravo departure, runway one two, climb initially four thousand feet, squawk six five four three.
You are AeroAI ATC.

{"controller_role": "TOWER", "callsign": "AAL100", "dep_runway": "RW04R", "wind_dir": 030, "wind_kt": 18, "wind_gust_kt": 25}
PILOT: American one zero zero, ready
American one zero zero, wind zero three zero degrees one eight knots gusting two five, runway zero four right, cleared for takeoff.
